title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification issued
pursuant to this Part. (b) There shall be fees charged as follows: (1)
a fee of 25 cents per page for each copy
not exceeding 9 x 14 inches in size for reproductions made on copying machines; and
(2)
a fee equal to the actual
cost of materials and machine time for reproductions which cannot be made on a
copying machine. The actual cost shall be the average unit cost for reproducing
a record, excluding fixed costs such as operator salaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7801.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
